An [[Aburame]] has thousands of their [[kikaichū]] gather together until they've taken on the size and appearance of the Aburame, to be used either as a decoy or a diversion. The insect clone can be created anywhere that the kikaichū are positioned or sent to, making it more useful for certain tasks than a [[shadow clone]].<ref name="d2"/> When the insect clone is struck, it disperses back into a swarm of kikaichū.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 126</ref> In the anime, the insect clones take a solid enough form to coordinate with the user for joint attacks.<ref>''Naruto Shippūden'' episode 236</ref>
